unnormalised: Regarding the recent service disruptions at HDFC Bank, customers are advised to note that UPI transactions exceeding Rs. 2000 may face temporary delays. Furthermore, account holders experiencing difficulties with NEFT transfers should contact customer support at 1800-123-4567 for immediate assistance. Kindly note that scheduled maintenance is planned for 15/11/2024, between 10:00 PM and 2:00 AM IST, which may affect online banking services. We appreciate your patience.
normalised: Regarding the recent service disruptions at H-D-F-C Bank, customers are advised to note that U-P-I transactions exceeding rupees two thousand may face temporary delays. Furthermore, account holders experiencing difficulties with N-E-F-T transfers should contact customer support at one eight zero zero one two three four five six seven for immediate assistance. Kindly note that scheduled maintenance is planned for fifteenth november two thousand and twenty four, between ten P-M and two A-M I-S-T, which may affect online banking services. We appreciate your patience.
